title: Burn My Soul: Part II
description: In Book 2, Jinny travels to Egypt to confront her past lives. What will she find when she gets there and will she be able to handle what she uncovers? Will she be able to forgive Franklin for killing her in her past life? In Egypt, she experiences a tremendous amount of de ja vu. It is because she has lived in the place before or is it much more than that? Lucifer is still hunting her and Jinny finds out that she is indeed the one prophesied about but clearly does not want the honor as she finds out there is now a faction of the angelic army hunting her as well and they want her dead. Will she survive what she must now face or will she retreat to the world of her subconscious forever more? Find out in Book 2 of The Soul Series....
author: Holly Newhouse
